I celebrate this time of year for the same reason your church decided to back in around 350 CE ...the winter solstice; a solar event which has been celebrated since the dawn of mankind, many tens and possibly hundreds of thousands of years before the papyrus scribblings of some fearful desert dwellers... It really doesn't matter how un-Christlike you people act by trying to exclude the secular world from the joy and fellowship of the season...because: history. Happy holidays, I hope you have a nice Christmas. I'm pretty sure your Jesus would want EVERYONE to enjoy the season...even us heathens. Sorry you don't like the idea of sharing something that your religion stole in the first place.

I got promoted twice while pumping at work. Women have, on average, 2.5 children over the course of 50 or so years in the workforce. The number of women that will need to pump during work in the same time period in the same workplace is going to be a pretty low percentage. Plus, most employers already do this out of basic human decency. When I worked in an office and pumped twice a day, I took my laptop with me and continued to work. I took way less break time than the smokers.
